item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Leonard Michaels
item.description: "Never to have to think of yourself as white is a luxory that makes you deeply stupid." -- Leonard Michaels

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Michael Ondaatje
item.description: "He turns his back to the far shore and rows toward it. He can in this way travel away from, yet still see, his house....he feels he is riding a floating skeleton...Some birds in the almost-dark are flying as close to their reflections as possible." -- Michael Ondaatje

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Charles Wright
item.description: "Our dreams are luminous, a cast fire upon the world. Morning arrives and that's it. Sunlight darkens the earth." -- Charles Wright

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by John Berryman
item.description: "I am so wise I had my mouth sewn shut." -- John Berryman

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Maurice Switzer
item.description: "It is better to remain silent at the risk of being thought a fool, than to talk and remove all doubt of it." -- Maurice Switzer

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Isak Dinesen
Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "Between two evils, I always pick the one I never tried before." -- Mae West

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Anyone who lives within their means suffers from a lack of imagination." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut, Jr
item.description: "Dear future generations: Please accept our apologies. We were rolling drunk on petroleum." -- Kurt Vonnegut, Jr

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "One of the few good things about modern times: If you die horribly on television, you will not have died in vain. You will have entertained us." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Christopher Hitchens
item.description: "What can be asserted without evidence can also be dismissed without evidence." -- Christopher Hitchens

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Voltaire
item.description: "It is dangerous to be right in matters on which the established authorities are wrong." -- Voltaire

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "If a book about failures doesn't sell, is it a success?" -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Ralph Waldo Emerson
item.description: "Our greatest glory is not in never failing, but in rising up every time we fail." -- Ralph Waldo Emerson

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Samuel Beckett
item.description: "All of old. Nothing else ever. Ever tried. Ever failed. No matter. Try again. Fail again. Fail better." -- Samuel Beckett

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by John Steinbeck
item.description: "It has always seemed strange to me...The things we admire in men, kindness and generosity, openness, honesty, understanding and feeling, are the concomitants of failure in our system. And those traits we detest, sharpness, greed, acquisitiveness, meanness, egotism and self-interest, are the traits of success. And while men admire the quality of the first they love the produce of the second." -- John Steinbeck

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "So you think that you're a failure, do you? Well, you probably are. What's wrong with that? In the first place, if you've any sense at all you must have learned by now that we pay just as dearly for our triumphs as we do for our defeats. Go ahead and fail. But fail with wit, fail with grace, fail with style. A mediocre failure is as insufferable as a mediocre success. Embrace failure! Seek it out. Learn to love it. That may be the only way any of us will ever be free." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Bram Stoker
item.description: "We learn from failure, not from success!" -- Bram Stoker

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Ambition is the last refuge of the failure" -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Henry David Thoreau
item.description: "If we will be quiet and ready enough, we shall find compensation in every disappointment." -- Henry David Thoreau

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "His voice wore no pants." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "Consider the silent repose of the sausage as compared to the aggressiveness of bacon. " -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "We are seldom as limited as we think we are." -- Tom Robbins

item.title: Paul (formerly known as Current) add a quote by Tom Robbins
item.description: "The sky was the color of Edgar Allen Poe's pajamas." -- Tom Robbins
